snippet: Nontraditional funds like emerging-market bonds and high-dividend stocks can strengthen your portfolio, but you should understand their risks.
lead_paragraph: Nontraditional funds like emerging-market bonds and high-dividend stocks can strengthen your portfolio, but you should understand their risks.

headline.seo: When Reaching for Higher Returns, Mind the Risks
headline.main: When Reaching for Returns, Mind the Risks
